title: The application was unable to start correctly(0xc0000006)
body: The application was unable to start correctly(0xc0000006) league of legends help me please :(((((({{summoner:14}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{item:1038}}

replies.body: Where is this error happening?  For example when you're opening the launcher or trying to get into a game?  Do you have any screenshots?

I have the same error, when ever i try to launch the client, it just gets interrupted and a window pops up. It says "The application was unable to start correctly (Ox0000005). Click OK to close the application." I got this error from opening too many league clients, then ending the process tree for each of them. Now I don't know how to fix it. :(
